short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows for a quick search of highlighted text with search engines.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows for a quick search of highlighted text with various search engines. To change search engine which you want to use in the context menu click looking glass icon in browser action area.
Available search engines: Google(default), Bing, Yahoo and Wikipedia - English language only.
